website_summaries.verdict: This luxurious lounger provides a soothing sense of security by gently hugging babies. Ideal for tots who insist on being held all the time.
pros: Premium organic cotton construction is ultra soft, breathable, and non-irritating
Center sling is engineered to draw the sides in, producing a cozy, hug-like effect
Helps babies stay on their backs
Removable cover makes for hassle-free cleaning
Comes with a zippered bag for on-the-go use
cons: The cover could do with a tighter fit

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns!
customer_reviews.text: Great for newborns, as it snuggles them with its hammock design. However, baby outgrew it by 3 months. Lifesaver for those first few months though. Fits nicely in the halo bassinet. See picture for size comparisons. Baby is 7 months in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Cozy baby
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great for traveling or setting baby down anywhere in the house. Price is shocking. Bougt it at about 5 weeks. Pic is at almost 3 months. He is about 17 lbs and 26+", a very large 3mo
customer_reviews.author: RockaPants

customer_reviews.title: It works great for us!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this pillow! I bought it when my daughter was 3 or 4 months old. She is now 17 months and still uses it every night! She is short but her legs hang over the edge if she straightens them. It doesn’t seem to bother her at all. This pillow has been a life safer for trips because it doesn’t matter where she sleeps as long as she has her pillow. It’s also easy to clean, just pop it in the washer! I definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Beauchat

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced & DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars I would. I fell for the rave reviews but it’s truly just an overpriced pillow. Not to mention the cover is beyond awful! The fabric bled with the first wash and ruined an entire load of laundry. I now have several yellow onesies , receiving blankets, burp clothes etc. The fabric also faded with its first wash and stretched out so badly it does not fit the pillow properly anymore. Beyond some quality issues this product poses some serious safety concerns. I do not recommend buying this product or anything that is similar.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: This is why I am afraid to order so many products online... Was more excited for this than anything and my baby is due in a week and this arrived with stains all over it
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my initial review. I'll be buying the doc a tot to compare. Upon opening the package, I immediately smelled a strange chemical oder. It got pretty strong to the point I have to wash it. Even after, I'm airing it out to see how my baby like it. It is too small tho. My boy is a premie and it barely fits him. I am really not sure how long I can use it for even if the smell is not an issue. I want to do a side by side comparison video once I get the doc a tot. Most likely return this after
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for NB
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. Very soft. Easy to clean. My baby hated it tho. And she was always getting very hot in it since it hugs the baby in there. Not good for hot climates. I lost the original packaging so I cannot return. Perfect for NB I think. They have that snug feel and they grow getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so awesome. I have a preemie who spent 10 days in the NICU. Sleeping has been a nightmare. I have to cosleep with him for now which isn’t ideal but if I don’t, neither of us will sleep. He loves to be held and hates being put down. This thing has been amazing, it’s allowed me to put him in it while I’m doing things around the house. I only put him in it when I’m supervising him but it also great because bc it doesn’t make him sink into it and block his face. I bought 2 of these, one for upstairs and one for downstairs lol
customer_reviews.author: AE79

customer_reviews.title: Much too tight!
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels nice, but my baby hated it! He had the most startled and horrified look on his face when I put him in it. It just hugged him way too tight! And I have to hold him for naps so he likes touch! The way his body was smooshed and his arms were pushed up just looked horrible. He looked like he couldn’t breathe. I tried a few more times but he cried as soon as he touched it. My baby was two months old when I tried. Perhaps it is better for extremely young babies? Waste of money for us...
customer_reviews.author: Mara Leason

customer_reviews.title: So far baby is 8 weeks and we like it. My baby is pretty Big so for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far baby is 8 weeks and we like it. My baby is pretty Big so for the price it's kinda sad it won't last long bc her feet are already hanging over and I can't afford the price of the extra long one now available. I wish it wasn't a $100 more than this one for 2 more inches.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Every mom should get this product !!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product !!! My baby started using it when he was 1 month old and it improve his sleeping !! He went from waking up every 2 hours to sleeping 4 to 5 hours !! Then at 2 months he slept 7 hours !! I love this product every mom should get it !! My son loves it!! He is currently 4 months and just transitioned him to his crib and the transition has been so smooth !! Also wanted to mention that I actual use the product inside his bassinet which is a halo and it for perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite baby product
customer_reviews.text: This is my and my husbands favorite product that we have for our newborn. We only allow him to nap in it during the day when we are near him since it’s safest for baby to sleep on his back on a flat mattress. I couldn’t decide between a dockatot and this but I’m really happy that I went with this because it snuggles him perfectly so he naps in there really well. I bought the ‘natural’ and the ‘moss’ covers and love them both. As a bonus, pictures of babies in a snuggle me are adorable! I’m going to use this with a letter board to take monthly milestone pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too flimsy for $140
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product. We have a 3 week old and need a co sleeper for our bed, reading the reviews here seemed like it was the best option. Very surprised at how flimsy and lightweight this product is, and the “cover” is super loose fitting vs being tightly secured like a boppy cover is. Even for my 7lb infant this product was so flimsy he kinda sinks in it- especially if we tried to prop it up a little so his head would sit up, the middle part just sagged and his little backwasnt supported at all. For $140 I was expecting it to be way more substantial in support and sturdiness so we are returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase, worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to buy and spend $140 dollars on it . My 3 week old child was not sleeping the night on her bassinet and preferred to be either held or the play and pack sleeper. Baby slept Longer periods with no fuss. We don't use it as a coalesced. My husband and I agree this was the best purchase and totally worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco/Delmarie

customer_reviews.title: USED, stained, smelly and disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and paid for a brand new product and received a used one that smelled terrible and had multiple stains and hairs on it. Pretty disappointing considering I bought this for my newborn. Definitely would not recommend. Please think about purchasing elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but my baby doesn’t like it!! I tried first when she was a newborn but she would not lay in it for long -or sleep in it without crying and fussing. I’ve tried numerous times since then and she still doesn’t like it. She’s only 2 months old now but I still can’t put her in it for long. Very disappointing considering how expensive it was...and of course now it’s too late for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Only suitable for newborns
customer_reviews.text: This was really great when my son was born. He weighed slightly over 7lbs when we brought him home from the hospital. He loved this bed when he was that size, and I loved it too. By the time he was 5 weeks old, he quickly started liking it less and less. The more he grew, the more he felt cramped. Now that he’s two months old (12.5lbs), he won’t use it at all and just cries if I put him on it. If this bed were cheap, I’d give it five stars for sure, but at its price, I definitely would’ve expected it to be usable for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lakenan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on dock a tot and snuggle me and finally chose the snuggle me organic. The item was well made and high quality. The cover is soft and easy to remove for cleaning. The cushioned edges are better than I imagined. I would give The product 5 stars if my infant would have used it. Sadly, my newborn hated it. She would almost instantly wake when placed in it. I was eager to get sleep and tried countless times thinking that after all the amazing reviews she had to love it. But after 2 weeks of trying I finally gave up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't provide support to the back.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't add value. There is no hard surface at the bottom. I dont want my baby to sleep in this. There are better options available.
customer_reviews.author: jaswinder

customer_reviews.title: Too sung for my sons liking
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to give this product 1 star. My 7 week old son hated it. Every time I would put him in it during his nap he would wake up immediately screaming. He’s a baby who doesn’t like to be restricted and I think the sides just come in too tight for him. It’s weird the bottom has no mattress, so it causes him to sink in, even when placed on the couch. Every baby is different, I bought the dock a tot too and he seems to like it so far. Also the material is a bit rough without the case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top registry item!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’m on baby number two, my top three registry items I tell everyone to get are as follows: 1. Halo swivel sleeper 2. Love to dream sleep sacks 3. Snuggle me organic lounger My little guy loves the way this cuddles him. Before, he would keep himself awake trying to find the perfect spot for his head but with this, he can rest his cheek on either side. I put him down in it and he snuggles right into it! The green color is really nice as well ❤️. The only thing that is a bummer is that he will grow out of it relatively quickly. Until then, we’ll keep snuggling!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Helps baby nap longer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried putting my newborn in her crib, bassinet, rock n play, and swing when she naps, but nothing keeps her asleep in the afternoon as well as this thing!! Luckily it can fit right into her crib and bassinet, or I can easily move her to the sofa, where I can keep a better eye on her. This design really does Snuggle her. When I place her in the center, the sides gently hug her body and she relaxes immediately. The easy to remove cover is also key, as she does spit up a lot. I highly recommend this for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: We loved this for our son. He unfortunately outgrew it by 3 months (he’s long). He hated being swaddled but wanted that snug feeling and was a touch colic. It really helped us, we went from up 5-6 times to 2-3. The cover was so soft and super easy to clean. I never had to clean the mattress pad itself. We really loved it and plan on using it for our next.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn

customer_reviews.title: Must buy, especially for first time parents!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing and gave us much needed sleep with our newborn. She would not sleep on a flat surface and only wanted to sleep in the recalled rock-n-play, this meant I was constantly up and monitoring her and not sleeping. We got this after it was recommended to us and she instantly took to it. I no longer had to worry about her at night and the first time she slept in it she slept for 5 hours!! I would pay any amount for those precious sleep hours during the first 3 weeks of new parenthood.
customer_reviews.author: styler

customer_reviews.title: Best baby buy ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best baby thing we bought! We got two (for our twins) and they're amazing. We moved them all over the house when they were little so we could lay them down safely, and they still sleep in them now, at almost 4 months old. We only had to swaddle until about 4 weeks because they felt snug enough in these. I now only wish I'd bough the most expensive one, knowing how much use we've gotten out of them!
customer_reviews.author: LinC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 1/2 month old Granddaughter who was not sleeping well. One night at 1:30am I was trying to get her to sleep, and desperately searching for something to help her (and Mom and Grandma) sleep. After reading many reviews, I hesitantly ordered it. Granddaughter was initially a bit resistant, but now sleeps like a baby. When she's fussing in the bassinet, we switch to the pillow. Baby can also sleep in the bed with her Mom safely. Only drawback, I wish it came with a spare cover. One of the most expensive pillows I've purchased, but absolutely worth every penny. We all sleep better now.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Dambra

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t recommend the Snuggle Me enough
customer_reviews.text: Our Snuggle Me saved us a lot of sleep the first couple of weeks after our baby was born. He now just lounges in it during the day here a little and there a little. This being our first baby, we will use this product for all of our future kiddos. Couldn’t recommend the Snuggle Me enough. We especially love the travel case that allows us to pack it up and take it with us to the grandparent's house (in the off chance the grandparents want to put the baby down, which doesn’t happen often)! It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Kutterer

customer_reviews.title: amid many tears I gave this another shot during nap time and it was amazing! It was just what was needed for help ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: In an effort to move our little to the crib, amid many tears I gave this another shot during nap time and it was amazing! It was just what was needed for help with the transfer. Now we are getting full nights of sleep. Yay! Our little has to be swaddled, so I thought this would be perfect. It's been hot and cold. We have not tried to use it much lately, but every now and then it does the trick and earns its keep. Other times, not so much. We missed the return window, so we will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Txalarmguy

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 baby item purchased
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know how much I was going to like this. I debated for a while between this and the doc a tot. But when I got home from the hospital and put my son in this, he slept so well! I’d say that this is probably my number 1 baby item that I’ve got this time around. Whatever room I’m in I bring this with me to set my baby in. I can tell that he is comfy and safe when he’s in his Snuggle Me.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Swanson

customer_reviews.title: My newborn is enjoying it so far...
customer_reviews.text: Here is my 3 day old newborn. We just arrived home today. He HATED the hospital bassinet and wouldn’t stand to be in there for any amount of time. My husband and I had to sneak him sleeping with us so we could all sleep. Fast forward to us arriving home, I was so relieved I had bought the Snuggle Me Organic. I knew he’d like it, and he does! I’m so thankful for this product. It’s easy to clean, install, and versatile because it’s easy to travel with. I’ll update my review should anything change, but so far, this product is highly recommended and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: New born slept in it for just 2 weeks &he grew out of it ,its too small for him now.Not worth $150
customer_reviews.text: New born baby boy slept in it for just 2 weeks and he grew out of it ,its too small for him now. He cant move his hands or leg its too compact. very uncomfortable .Not worth $150
customer_reviews.author: Majid syed

customer_reviews.title: Regret spending money on it
customer_reviews.text: Really doesn’t work. Baby is forced to put arms in awkward position unless swaddled. Swaddling is great yet the baby needs ample space for its arms when not bundled. The only thing it’s good for is instagram pics. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Could only use for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Snuggle Me so much until my three month old started rolling over. He was able to wiggle around in this way too much for comfort. He was able to turn himself on his side, and would end up with his face pressed against the pillow edges. I didn't feel safe after that, even with an Outlet on. I am now using a Dok A Tot. He is still able to get on his side but it is a little bit larger so his faces isn't completely smooshed. I only use the Snuggle me or the Dok A Tot when I am awake and can see him.
customer_reviews.author: metzs

customer_reviews.title: Baby sleeps in her bassinet again!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. My baby would not sleep on her back in her bassinet... it’s just not a natural position for them in the early months... so this helps her feel a little more “snuggled”. I was worried she would be able to get her face stuck against the side but there really is no way. We use the Snuza monitor on her anyway so there is a happy baby and peace of mind for mom! I was going to deduct a star for price but products made in the USA are inevitably more expensive and I would rather pay the higher price to have it made here and not penalize the company for doing so... so 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Troy

customer_reviews.title: Not as much room as dock a tot
customer_reviews.text: We have this and a dock a tot. We use both but the dock a tot definitely has more room for baby to turn her head without touching the side. A big concern for me when using things like this. She sleeps great in this (supervised) though as it’s nice and snug. The bottom is not cushioned at all so be careful what you lay it on and how hard you lay baby down in it. The cover is easy to remove and wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product, but unfortunately my newborn son did not sleep well in it at all. I ordered it in the middle of the night when I was exhausted, hoping for some better rest for us both.. but that didn't happen. I tried it for about a week to see if he would adjust after reading reviews that said it took their little one some time to get accustomed to it - but it didn't work the magic I was hoping for. I ended up returning it unfortunately. I know all babies are different and I am happy for those that this worked for, but that wasn't the case for us.
customer_reviews.author: CSS

customer_reviews.title: Family bed approved!
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to buy this product- I was a dummy. My daughter is currently 3 months old (13 weeks, 12 lb, 23”) and has slept in the bed with my husband and I since she was 8 weeks. Recently she had started rolling around in the bed making me nervous she would 1. Roll off the bed 2. Roll under the covers 3. Get squished. This 100% eliminated all of those issues PLUS it helps her fall asleep and stay asleep better. She digs the closeness the pillow provides and is safe in the family bed. I also move it into her crib during the day to help her nap- seems to help with the transition.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My baby hated it
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright. It’s an expensive pillow that would be worth the price tag if it helped my baby and I sleep, but she hated it. We tried for weeks but she cried the second we laid her in it but then again she’s 7 weeks old and still won’t let us set her down. She actually from day 1 rolls to her side to sleep in her bassinet so it just didn’t work for us so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: SmileFreshman

customer_reviews.title: I think the video of the product is kinda misleading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item so I could co- sleep with my newborn. My newborn was 7 pounds and 21 inches at birth. The bed wasn’t what I expected it to be. It is tad bit small for my taste and now at 1 month my baby barely fits on it. For the price, I was disappointed with this product. I am still hoping to use it when my baby starts holding his head up and sitting. Will be back to change my rating and view if I change my mind then.
customer_reviews.author: sam-ikshya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pillow
customer_reviews.text: This was a total game changer for our baby. She had bad reflux and this helped a lot. We propped up her bassinet mattress at the head and then put this pillow in there. The combination works great! We haven't had any reflux problems while she's sleeping since. Obviously it's a very expensive pillow, but we have found it worth every penny. We also travel with it. It's easy to squish into a suitcase and then we don't have to lug a bassinet or pack n play around. Instead, we just put her snuggleme on a separate bed, or in bed with us. She's never been able to roll out of it, so for now it feels plenty safe.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Calderone

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeper has truly been a lifesaver for my son. It took a few times to get him to used to it, but once we put a small blanket underneath it for extra comfort, he loved it. He is currently 3.5 months and has been sleeping through the night co-sleeping in it since he was 2 months. We lightly swaddle him as well. Eventually he will outgrow it due to his length and becoming more mobile I would think, but I still have no regrets purchasing :)
customer_reviews.author: Lilygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the price was right and all the positive reviews. Plus I prefer hauling a backpack than a purse or diaper bag with 1 strap because they hurt my shoulders and I am always dropping them when I lean over, etc. I have received so many compliments on this bag from my childless friends who want one to use as a backpack. Lots of compartments for all the baby supplies plus the dozens of miscellaneous objects from my purse have made it really easy to keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: artlives

customer_reviews.title: We love it! We have a preemie
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We have a preemie, who is 6lb now, who would wake up constantly in her bassinet. I wish I would've known about this sooner, we could've saved ourselves some sleep and money! This is so amazing, our baby sleeps so well. My husband was worried about rolling over on the baby and was hesitant about it, but after the first night he said he was glad I bought it... I am recommending this to everyone I know and my friends who are expecting! I love your product!
customer_reviews.author: Quel

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money, Skip the Cover
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m happy with this pillow. I can’t it’s made a huge difference in our lives, but it’s nice to have around the house. I was, however, disappointed in the cover. It’s an envelope pocket without any zips, ties or buttons, and the fabric is nice but doesn’t blow me away... definitely not worth $50. It is easy to remove for cleaning, but it doesn’t fit the pillow well so fabric is often bunched. If I were to have a do-over, I would order only the pillow (sans cover) and use an extra pillowcase (king size fits well!) from home.
customer_reviews.author: McDermom

customer_reviews.title: Helps baby feel secure
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't use this product.because it was easier to co sleep with my little guy. Well lately I have transitioned him to the crib and he has been waking up pretty quickly after I put him down if he moves at all. So I decided to give this a try again. It seems so far to make him happier. I have seem him start to stir like usual but go right back to sleep. Love the quality of this product. So did my cat while it wasn't being used. So after baby grows out of it I may make it into a cat bed. Multipurpose. It also it super easy to clean and stays soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Better than dock-a-tot
customer_reviews.text: We just ordered one for our 3 week old, and he absolutely loves it. It truly does snug his body, and leaves just the right amount of space that is safe for him on his sides. You can prop them up as well and they are still able to relax comfortably! Perfect for travel, and just for being in home! I always wanted a dock-a-tot, but then I recently saw these online and I’m so glad I went with this one! The dock-a-tot that I saw in store, didn’t seem as snug and comforting as this one!
customer_reviews.author: b.

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this. Trust me.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my #1 absolute favorite baby item. Ever. By far the BEST co-sleeper I have found. The shape fits snug around baby so she feels as if she’s being held, allowing her a full 8-10 hours of sleep since four weeks old. Well worth the price. The cover is easy to clean, although the color did fade a bit after just a few washes. My only real complaint would be the length. I have a very lean & long baby, so as she’s grown her legs either crunch up into her tummy or hang up and over. We still use it nightly, just wish it were longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shaundre__

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I researched and researched between this and dockatot. I could not bring myself to pay that much for a dockatot and this one honestly look softer for baby. I waited and waited.. came home from hospital with baby and ordered it after one night home. She loves it it snuggles her tight so. I’m exclusively pumping and it’s perfect for her while I pump she can lay in it right beside me. The materials are so soft I purchased one with a cover and haven’t had to wash it yet but I’m sure having a cover is going to be easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby sleeps better but say goodbye to your good sleep forever as parents
customer_reviews.text: Our new born has the hardest time sleeping in her own crib. The baby would constantly jerk around while grunting most of the night. This product solves many of those problem for us and now the baby sleeps 4 to 5 hours stretches with no problem. We are using as a co sleeper and works wonderfully. Recommended as co sleeper for light sleepers(parents) or as insert in the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Denzil Khine

customer_reviews.title: Great for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for my newborn to now five month old every night and nap time. She gets swaddled then placed in it to sleep. It is a great product and I’m very happy to have purchased it. It even fits perfectly in her mini crib. This is my seventh baby and she is my best sleeper! I take the snuggle me to grandmas house and place it on the carpeted floor for naps. She also likes to snuggle the sides with her face and it helps keep the pacifier in. A bassinet crib sheet fits it perfectly as well while I’m washing the cover. I have not washed the actual pillow yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cox

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this pillow out of desperation and I'm so glad that we did
customer_reviews.text: This pillow saved my sanity! I was hesitant to spend the money but my daughter wanted to be on me or next to me for the first several months of her life. I couldn't rest knowing that she might not be safe. We purchased this pillow out of desperation and I'm so glad that we did. She slept inside of her Snuggle Me in the middle of our bed. She loved it! I think that it made her feel "snuggled". We eventually were able to transfer the Snuggle Me pillow to the bassinet feature of our 4Moms Breeze. Get it, you won't regret spending the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wooten

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS BED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a god send. We bought this out of desperation after 3 sleepless nights of our newborn not sleeping in her bassinet. The first night she slept 4 hours straight, and now at 5 weeks old she sleeps 6 hours straight through the night. It fits comfortably between my husband and I in our queen size bed, and also fits perfectly inside a halo bassinet. The style of the bed swaddles baby tight without making her feel trapped.
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lounger for my NICU grad
customer_reviews.text: My 5 week old baby spent the first 3 weeks of her life in the NICU. Since we have brought her home she has had trouble sleeping due to all the containment aids they used in the NICU to soothe her. The snuggle me has been the perfect bridge to help my little one sleep! I was in between getting this or the dock-a-tot and I'm glad I chose this! I will update my review around the 1 month mark to comment on how the snuggle me holds up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price- little one loves it and gives us some sanity!
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought I had lost my mind when I insisted we buy this $150+ “pillow” after no one purchased it off of our registry. Now that we’ve been home from the hospital for 3 days, we couldn’t live without it! Gives us a place to put our little one while we’re relaxing on the couch, doing chores, eating, etc. She seems to love the feeling that it’s holding her and she doesn’t get as comfortable or sleep as well in just her open bassinet. I wish she was able to actually sleep in it at night because she loves it so much but that’s not recommended as safe. Overall really happy with it and worth all the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Katey

customer_reviews.title: You will use this ALL THE TIME
customer_reviews.text: I debated on buying something like this, because it's expensive. Our baby sleeps well during the night, but I was more concerned about having a safe and portable device I could bring around for him to lounge on without the fear of him rolling off. We've used our pillow everywhere! We mostly use it on the couch, as it is perfect for interacting with your baby on a different surface. Because it's so easy to carry around, we can change up scenery all we want, as long as it's on a softer surface. It's very soft and easy to clean. It's also ideal for napping on the go if you are at a family member's house without a crib!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy! Its great for lounging and naps. My little one did not like to be swaddled arms in but still like that wrapped and cuddled feeling so this is perfect. For certain hair types the cover is a little rough on but worth it just have to figure out another way of covering it.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have in the early months.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases we’ve ever made for us and baby. It helped us tremendously with feedings and with just putting him to sleep. We barley had him in the bassinet cause he slept better on the pillow. Always supervise your child when they are sleeping in it. We didn’t know what to do when we didn’t have it. Great product and great quality. We also ordered a second time and sent that pillow to our friends who are expecting as well as a gift form us and how it helped us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality product, didn't solve our problem.
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all the very happy mamas and mulling it over for a few months, I finally bought one. My baby won't nap longer than 20 minutes unless we hold him (then he'll nap for 3 hours) and I was really hoping for a break. We're two days in and daytime sleep hasn't changed one bit. Unfortunately, we just bought a very expensive pillow that did us no good. Quality wise, this product is beautiful, comfortable, and easily cleaned. I would recommend for anyone who is looking for something like this. But every baby is different.
customer_reviews.author: whiterabbit

customer_reviews.title: YOU DON’T NEED THIS.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything it promises hence my five stars. That said, I promise you don’t need this. By the time my baby rolls over, he will be too big to be in this anyways and it is not meant to be used for co-sleeping or in a bassinet. If I’m going to be watching him either way, I could just as soon lay him in the middle of the bed or on a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: GiselleSmith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my baby
customer_reviews.text: This review is not so much about the quality of the product, which seems fine to me. It's soft, and breathable and the cover is easy to remove, wash, and dry. It just doesn't work for my baby, however. My baby loves a tight swaddle and I thought the Snuggle Me Organic would give a similar effect, but it doesn't, really. My baby just doesn't sleep in it. Also, I didn't realize beforehand, but this is not a co-sleeper and you can't leave your baby sleeping unattended in this. In hindsight, I wouldn't buy this again if I could go back.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the busy mommy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this lounger & so do we! She sleeps so soundly and is definitely snuggled up in this! I highly recommend this product if you have a new baby or one on the way! This makes me comfortable if I need to run to the bathroom and she’s napping. Now I never leave her unattended I can always see her but it gives me piece of mind to know she’s snuggled up in this, that may change as she gets older but for now it’s a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My baby would not sleep in bassinet for first few weeks. I bought this for co sleeping. Once he slept comfortably in this we placed this in the bassinet to help transition and it worked like a charm. We take it with us now when we travel for him to nap on when it’s a short trip and we don’t want to bring the whole pack n play. What we like most is that when we lay him in it it slightly snuggles him which is similar to being held.
customer_reviews.author: Jory

customer_reviews.title: My LO LOVES THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the halo bassinet! This was a total game changer! I had the hardest time getting my little guy To sleep until I found this product!! Just got 4 hours of sleep last night and couldn’t believe it! Might purchase a second one for traveling.. oh great for co sleeping too!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia caruso

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy seems to like it. The pillow and the cover are really soft and nice quality. The cover is similar to a pillowcase in that it can easily be removed and laundered. I like that he can continue to grow into it. I have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: LalaReviews

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!!! I wanted to get this for my baby when she was first born but wasn’t able to until she was about 2 months old. I was hesitant about the price at first, but soon realized it was completely worth every penny. She loves it, and falls asleep almost immediately in it. She used to wake herself up by throwing her hands up and I’ve noticed she doesn’t do it as much at all, and hasn’t woken herself up from moving. She seems very comfortable! I will recommend this to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hefren

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies who will only sleep in your arms
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday, and even though it was overpriced it’s changed our lives already. Baby sleeps in the bed with us in the mornings (Halo bassinet at night) but putting her on the mattress with blankets wasn’t safe, and she wasn’t happy. We also can’t put her down for naps, she fusses unless instead we hold her constantly. Enter this thing – game changer. Who just slept 4 straight hours in the bed? Both of us! I think the key is that this pillow mimics arms hugging them. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mckeown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleep!
customer_reviews.text: When I need my hands and baby is fussy and won't go down in crib, I put baby in the snuggle me and within 5 minutes, baby is asleep. I do not worry about baby turning or moving as the sides snug up close but do not block the head or face. Baby is comfy, safe, and secure. Happy momma!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for sleep deprived parents
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe no one told me about this product before my son was born! He refused to sleep in his bassinet and due to reflux and some other issues, tried co-sleeping with the dock-a-tot and naps on his boppy lounger and he would wake every 2-3 hours. The first day in this lounger and he slept for five hours. It’s a life saver for sleep deprived parents!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My baby hates it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this and, before I had my baby, was convinced I needed it. I knew it was expensive for a pillow but totally justified the purchase to myself thinking it would save my sanity. Unfortunately, it did not save my sanity. My baby HATES it. I’m sure it must be great for some babies, but not mine. Total bummer that we wasted so much money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: What I like: It's organic cotton, it's soft & easy to wash, it's cozy, baby fits in it nicely, not too big for the bed, doubles as a breastfeeding pillow for us. What I don't love: Expensive for what is basically a pillow, not quite snug enough- sometimes I put pillows under each side so the middle hangs more and baby fits more snugly, baby doesn't stay sleeping in it very long (he doesn't stay sleeping long when he's not on my body in general so not exactly the Snuggle pillow's fault.)
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but not for us
customer_reviews.text: The product was just as advertised- super soft, great quality material, and a little hugging action when the baby is laid down. But In the end it did not work for us. Our little guy (4.5mons) was not happy in it. We may have just discovered it too late - might have had better luck if we tried it earlier. We also felt uncomfortable trying to have him sleep in it after we realized it is only recommended for supervised naps.
customer_reviews.author: Crash Chapel

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for us! He wasn't taking to his bassinet. I think this co-sleeper gave him the extra security he needed to sleep well. Not to mention, I was able to sleep better as well. Don't think of this as an "expensive pillow", it really is a bed. We traveled everywhere with this- no pack n' play needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica_Min

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product but didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely product, great quality, really love how soft it is and the color. Buuuut, my son HATED it. The moment I put him in it, he’d howl. If he managed to fall asleep, he’d wake up with a piercing shriek. I have no idea what his beef with it was - maybe he was too big for it so it was toooo snuggly? In any case, I sent it back because it just didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: dizzylizzy

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed ! It looked like someone has burnt a hole in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is so soft plush and comfortable. I am so surprised the quality is unbelievable. I was torn between doc a tot because everyone was buying one but the quality you guys is so much more. The doc a tot to me feels like cheap teddy bear stuffing wrapped up in a cute looking product. Glad i made the right choice with the snuggle me organic!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Magallanes

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had found it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I really wish we had gotten this sooner. After a few night stay at the hospital at 7 weeks my now 3 & a half month old had stopped sleeping in longer stretches and only slept on me at night. We've had the snuggle me for 3 nights now and even through his fussiness I've been able to get him to sleep in the snuggle me after first taking asleep on me. I call this a major win and I am so grateful this product is working for us. I hope it works for your family too! I wish I had found this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: I freaking LOVE this Product!
customer_reviews.text: Ok first time mom here. So really had all these hard set thoughts of not co sleeping, baby will sleep in bassinet by the bed. Well baby didnt like the bassinet. So bought this and it has made night nursing and sleep quality better for both of us. My baby is snug and safe next to me and can be quieted back to sleep easily or pulled out and fed and put back. Love this product and the all natural and organic cotton used for it. Great company great product!
customer_reviews.author: Witchy Healer

customer_reviews.title: Great for swaddling newbies!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are first time parents and have struggles to swaddle our baby and put him back to sleep. We now keep the swaddle positioned on the snuggle me, place our sleeping baby in the snuggle me and then tuck on both sides. The sides of the snuggle me softly snuggle him around his belly. The product is a little expensive though. Our son is 6 weeks old and I don't know if he will like it as he gets bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Akash Mohanty

customer_reviews.title: Life (and sleep) saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: The price on this had me pretty apprehensive but after a month of use I can confirm that's it's worth every penny! We tried so many different sleep gadets that we ended up returning. Baby just wanted to be held. First nap in the snuggle me was the longest she'd ever slept on her own. She has all her naps in it and sleeps in it at night. This is the first thing I recommend to new parents now!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I really like our product but I didn’t find it to be like a miracle worker with my son or anything so far, he only 6 weeks and we’ve had this since day one but some days he likes it and some days he doesn’t. If he’s fussy he much preferrs a swing rather than being set in this. I think it’s way too expensive and over hyped but we got it as a gift and it has been nice and convenient to move around as a portable place for him, plus I can put him in it in our big bed and not worry about squishing him!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: Baby in Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a baby who hates his bassinet. Even though all recommendation says not to use for bassinet, I did. Was very concerned with SIDS when looking to purchase for this reason. My baby seems to like it, has helped get him in the bassinet, although not 100%. Feel pretty safe with it. He’s 2months and can get rest at night without worrying about his breathing. I do use in conjunction with a Snuza breathing monitor. Product is very nice. High quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this out of desperation after 3 days home from the hospital and my baby would not sleep anywhere but on me. She cried/screamed with sleeping on crib mattress, bassinet, etc. I bought this and it changed everything. She started sleeping so much better! It seems so much more comforting for sleep than a hard flat crib surface. Best money I have spent on a baby product
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Loving our Snuggle Me so far!! Babe is barely 3 days old but she prefers her Snuggle Me lounger for sleep over anywhere else! We had a Dockatot with our last babe and she hated it so wanted to mention how much we prefer the Snuggle Me over the Dockatot! MUCH easier to take care of/clean and design makes much more sense! FYI - also loving the Snuggle Me Swaddle - it's got a great stretch to the fabric!!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: why didn't i buy this sooner!?
customer_reviews.text: 3 months of sleepless nights & several "cheap fixes" to help the newborn sleep i finally broke down and bought this. Wish i would have spent the money from the beginning! I recommend this product to all my new moms. I wasn't sure if i was too late in the game to benefit from the snuggle me but he fit in it perfectly and still does at 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mickalonis

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this pillow nightly for about 1.5 months (daughter is 13 weeks). She seems to really like that it keeps her arms from flailing all over the place as she likes them up near her head. The rose color is absolutely gorgeous, and you can easily fit a king size pillow case over it. We placed a satin cover over it to help keep her hair from thinning out and it’s worked great. We actually tried to remove the pillow and she tossed and turned until we placed her back in it. But pricey, but having her sleep several hours straight is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Randirrah Singh

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not for us - but a good product
customer_reviews.text: We tried this and for our daughter when she was 2.5 months and it didn’t work very well. She wasn’t a fan of being cocooned, which is just her preference. Other infants may love that feeling. She tossed her head from side to side while in it, trying to make space. She didn’t sleep as well as she does when she’s on a flat surface, and she wasn’t interested in lounging in it because she wanted to move freely. It was high quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Mindee J. Plugues

customer_reviews.title: Just didn’t work for my baby
customer_reviews.text: My newborn just wasn’t a fan. He also got a little hot inside it because he runs hot a lot. That being said I still kept the toddler version bc I think it’s a great product. I would love to sleep in it lol. Rated a little lower on “easy to clean” just bc I ordered the ivory color and it picked up everything from lint on blankets and pet hair (we have 2 dogs).
customer_reviews.author: McValerie

customer_reviews.title: Hugs your baby just right
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough great things about the Snuggle Me! We didn’t have one for my first born and had to have so many extras for sleep. I love that my little one only needs the Snuggle Me for sleep (no incline, vibration, rocking). It hugs her just right. The cover is super soft and easy to remove to wash. There’s plenty of times she’s laid down still awake and after just a minute she’s sleeping soundly. Did I mention through the night??? What more could a mama ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped my LO sleep on their own!!
customer_reviews.text: If your LO wants to be held at night and won’t sleep on their own, I highly recommend this product. Granted it is a bit pricey but if you’re desperate for some sleep between feedings then it is well worth the money!! (My LO is 3 weeks and I wake up to any coo or other noise she makes, constantly checking on her). The bottom is flat and the sides slant down so your LO face is not in the side risking suffocation. It fits perfectly in her bassinet and it’s great for around the house or on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely High Quality! Better than other brands!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I decided to go with this brand over the others. It feels like a memory foam baby mattress!!! The cover is so soft. It’s much larger than I anticipated and it works perfect for co-sleeping to breastfeed or in our bassinet!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Capra

customer_reviews.title: Snuggles baby when you can't
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver when my daughter was first born. I could put it on the bed when I was folding laundry, for example. She could still see me and was comfy enough to fall asleep on her own. Also nice for travel if you keep the case. She's too big for it now (almost 6 months). Once she was able to push her way off of it, I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The BEST for sleep
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the snuggle me pillow! It's not recommended for sleep, but my son has slept in this pillow since he came home in the hospital without any issues. It hugs his body and prevents him from rolling around in the bassinet. When the pillow isn't in the bassinet he finds his way over to the side and smashes his face against the side every single time. The fabric is soft and the cover is easily washed. The carrying case has a handle, which is perfect for travel. This is hands-down one of my favorite newborn purchases and I'm so glad I splurged on this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases for our baby. We use this in our bed in the morning when we transition from pack and play to our bed for a bit in the morning. Most importantly, we started baby in a rock and play and once he grew out of that we didnt know how to transistion him to sleep flat in his oack and play or crib. This worked like a dream. Just not sure how to get him out of this. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: cari king

customer_reviews.title: Not all the rave
customer_reviews.text: Sadly to say, this isn’t worth the money. Maybe to some but not for us unfortunately. My son slept in it for a day than hated it afterwards. Reasons were, the inside part where you lay them in. It’s not cushioned so if you’re laying baby down on something soft it’ll be comfy but if it’s hard baby won’t like it. He outgrew it within 2 weeks of having it, his feet hanged out of it mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Maika

customer_reviews.title: I love it but its kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: When i lay my baby in it i prop her head over the top and the cotton separates almost every time to where its pointless to prop her head. Ita a little flimay but its nice and she sleeps well in it. I dont know if i can justfy the price but i wont be returning it. You can't find anything like it
customer_reviews.author: kayleepearson

customer_reviews.title: Love it but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my snuggle me organic, it’s the best thing ever!!! So glad i got it. But the only thing is i got it end of September and i noticed that the one end of the pillow is starting to be flat compared to the other sides of the pillow. I never washed the pillow just the cover as well. So is it going all become flat side within a year? . But other then that i love it! But that is the only con i have with it. I tried to fluff it up but it’s still flat :/
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: The first time this came in the mail it was moldy so we returned it. Gave it another shot a few weeks later but my infant does not like it. I can't say it's a bad product because other infants may like it. The problem we have with this it snugs too much and the material feels cheap for the price. Its definitely a mid range product but we tried other co sleepers and found one that works for the baby.. It wasn't cheap but you get what you pay for. Dont settle for one product.
customer_reviews.author: tpham83

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Snuggle Me Organic and I could not be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: I am a very weary buyer and after a lot of research, I bought the Snuggle Me Organic and I could not be happier with it. My baby girl loves it and we co-sleep so much better with it! Instead of the cover that comes with it, I use a changing pad cover that lost its elastic to cover the little bed and that works best for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Absolute life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: We received this when our little guy was 12 days old. We could not get him to fall asleep in his bassinet which resulted into co sleeping with him, which continuously made my hubby and I nervous due to risk of SIDS. After we received our Snuggle Me we placed him in it right away and he fell asleep.. and stayed asleep! I was a bit hesitant at first due to the price, but we were desperate and this is 110% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Althaus

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this:(
customer_reviews.text: Tried this instead of the infamous Dock a Tot, however, our newborn(now a couple months old) refuses to sleep in this for more than a couple minutes. I wanted to use this for traveling and have her be able to have a familiar sleeping environment since we travel a lot but she won’t lay in it:( Material is nice and I would want to lay in it if it was adult size! But it just is not for our infant.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

feature_bullets: THE NEXT BEST THING TO BEING HELD IN YOUR ARMS. The Snuggle Me Lounger is a unique lounging pad designed to hug your baby's full body. This snuggling sensation is highly effective at calming and comforting your baby when you need extra support
